item.title: Optimizing the coalition gain in Online Auctions with Greedy Structured Bandits
item.description: Two novel algorithms, Local-Greedy and Greedy-Grid, optimize coalition gain in online auctions with limited observations, achieving constant regret and problem-independent guarantees while respecting …
